name: Sticky Quickies
steps: In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 1/2 c. flour and yeast. Heat the milk, water, butter, sugar and salt until warm. Pour into yeast mixture. Add egg; beat on high for 3 minutes. By hand, stir in 1 3/4 c. flour. Cover and let rise for 30 min. While dough is still rising combine the topping ingredients in a saucepan and heat until melted-topping ingredients start with 3/4 c. butter. Pour into a 9x13 baking pan or bundt. Stir down batter and drop by tablespoons on topping. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes. Cool for 1 minute and cover with foil covered try or cookie sheet. Carefully invert to remove from pan.
